question: With which country has India signed a longterm agreement for Sukhoi Su-30MKI combat aircraft fleet?
explanation: India has signed with Russia a long term agreement for Sukhoi Su-30MKI. India and Russia are set to sign a pact for the purpose of quick delivery of spare parts for the Su-30MKI fleet that would ensure that the aircraft is available for more combat missionâ€”a key focus area for Defence Minister Manohar Parrikar who has working on reducing the amount of time frontline 26 fighters are grounded due to technical issues.
